sememes.reasoning: The definition 'call together' describes an action that causes individuals to change their state from dispersed to assembled.

The 'somebody' (a group of people) who are called and subsequently become assembled.
The 'PP' (prepositional phrase) in the frame typically specifies the location or context of the assembly.
